titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on Benzoic acid, 2- [[3-[[( 2,3-dihydro-2-oxo-1H-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl ) amino] carbonyl] -2- hydroxy-1-naphthalenyl]azo]-, butylester.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/11/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on benzoic acid, 2-((3-(((2,3-dihydro-2- oxo-1H-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl)amino) carbonyl)-2-hydroxy-1-naphthalenyl) azo)-, butyl ester.
